Expected result: The Welcome Back screen is shown.
The Ether balance is shown on the overview. The wallet address is shown on the overview. The selected network is Ethereum Mainnet.

Test steps: Select Expand view in the wallet menu.
Expected result: A new tab opens. The expanded extension view is shown.

Test steps: Proceed to Networks in the Settings menu.
Expected result: The list of main networks and test networks is shown.

Preconditions: A custom network should be added first.
Expected result: The network name, RPC URL, chain ID, currency symbol and block explorer URL are shown.
The request and status are shown in the Networks tab in the browser Developer Tools.
